Room.Name: Paladin Training Room
Room.ShortDescription: Congratulations! You may advance to the status of a level five paladin.
Room.LongDescription: Only the bravest and purist of paladins may serve in the kingdom, and many have failed to reach this exalted level. You are to be congratulated on your fine accomplishment. Kneel, and accept your transformation and added responsibilities and duties. You are a credit to knighthood.
